attributes.action: urge Worcestershire County, Wychavon District and Pershore Town Councils to cancel or at least defer the current proposals tabled to commence work on a Pershore High Street road enhancement scheme.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Traders and residents are still recovering from the disastrous economic and social effects of the crippling summer floods and also, earlier in the year, the severely disruptive roadwork's that caused immense commercial damage within the heart of the town.
Both local business people and individuals alike are concerned that these proposals are being forced through without the true feeling of the local community being taken into account.
